title: It's Arrived! It's Arrived!!!
content:
THANK YOU ZARA, Joseph Pemberton, et al, !!!   
My T-shirt came in a package stuffed with Typophile goodies and a lovely note from Zara Evens!   
   
All of you who have yet to become paying supporters. You don't know what you are missing. The goodies are truly UPPERCASE!   
It was worth the wait! (and it helps support this board)   
   
ChrisL
author: dezcom

comments.content:
Here's my double post, Chris L. The tee alone is worth the price of admission: 100% cotton for perfectionists and the logo on navy blue couldn't be classier. Then there are all those other goodies. Is this a great blog or what?   
   
Paul   
   
 [http://giam.typepad.com/the\_branding\_of\_polaroid\_/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803024309/http:/giam.typepad.com/the_branding_of_polaroid_/)

This is a smart man. I recommend you all listen   
to his wise, wise words.   
   
   
   
Zara
